quest.name: A Star Shines On
journal:
Voices ring out through Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre with calls for an encore.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

Amh Garanjy cheerfully informs you that the crowd is ready for an encore of your virtuoso performance. Speak with the celebrant of your choice to perform for the group of spectators they have assembled for the occasion.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

Thanks to your talents with the baton and another inspired performance from Lartonphe, his chocobo companion, and the choir of bowmen, your encore performance has proved a resounding success. Speak with Amh Garanjy, who will doubtless be thrilled that you have put yet more smiles on the children's faces during this very special Starlight season.

Amh Garanjy expresses her joy at being able to witness yet another show of surpassing virtuosity, and thanks you for all the happiness and good cheer you have brought to Gridania this Starlight. It would appear that your adoring fans are eager for as many encores as you are willing to perform for them. If you are once again inclined to join your friends and lend your musical gifts to the masses, you need only say the word.
objectives: Speak with the saturnine Starlight celebrant or the splendiferous Starlight celebrant.

dialogue.name: AMHGARANJY
dialogue.text: Welcome back, friend! Might I take this to mean that you've decided to grace us with an encore? Why, it's yet another Starlight miracle! Rest assured that I myself and all the members of your chorus are ready to proceed whenever you are.

dialogue.name: AMHGARANJY
dialogue.text: Needless to say, your adoring fans have already assembled in droves. As soon as you're ready to take the stage, you need only speak to one of the two celebrants with whom you've already acquainted yourself.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Quest difficulty and rewards will vary according to which Starlight celebrant you approach.

dialogue.name: AMHGARANJY
dialogue.text: Feeling a bit of stage fright, friend? If you find yourself having doubts, just remember─it's all for the children!

dialogue.name: LARTONPHE
dialogue.text: While I did not lack for confidence, I would be lying if I said I expected the reaction to be quite so enthusiastic. If the audience is calling out for an encore, who are we to refuse?

dialogue.name: NALIPPONCQUE
dialogue.text: You mean I can see the chocobo sing again? It's a Starlight miracle!

dialogue.name: CHOCOBO
dialogue.text: Kweh! Kweeeeeeeeeh!♪

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The chocobo appears eager to take to the stage once more.

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: Well? What did you think of my performance? I told you I was a bowman of many talents, did I not?

dialogue.name: LUCIANE
dialogue.text: To tell the truth, I was a bit anxious to take the stage, but I must say there's something positively infectious about bringing joy to others through song. I finally feel as if I understand why Jehantel chose the path he did.

dialogue.name: MIAHMOLKOT
dialogue.text: I'll thank you not to ask meow to sing while I'm on duty, mind you.

dialogue.name: MIAHMOLKOT
dialogue.text: Not meow─meow. Gah! Why do the words come out so much more easily when I'm singing!?

dialogue.name: COMMITTEE03724A
dialogue.text: Back for more, are you? <sigh> The younglings are as restless as ever. I told them that if they didn't settle down, the saint's little helper would be bringing them a lump of goobbue dung for Starlight. Anyhow, I suppose we might as well begin. This way, please.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text:
Do you wish to begin the cantabile?
You will earn two certificates of good cheer for successful completion of this piece.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Yes.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Not yet.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: How do I conduct a choir?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: Which song will you perform?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Starlight, Starbright

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Starlight de Chocobo

dialogue.name: COMMITTEE03724A
dialogue.text: Having second thoughts? I don't blame you. I wouldn't be caught dead up on that stage in front of all those expectant and eager faces. Oh, well...I suppose I'll just have to keep the children amused a while longer. Do come back when you've mustered the nerve, yes?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The choir will now perform a song. Time your inputs with the on-screen prompts.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
When a blue prompt appears (left), time your input as the diamonds overlap.
When an orange prompt appears (center), make several rapid inputs until the prompt disappears.
When a red prompt appears (right), press and hold the input for the duration of the prompt.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The controls are as follows:

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
Mouse: Left-click or right-click anywhere on screen
Keyboard: Any standard, unmodified key
Please note that chat will be temporarily disabled.ControllerGamepad: All buttons and directional buttons except [???]

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To access the Pause menu, press the escEsc key or [???] button, from which you may choose to end the performance.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you fail to follow an on-screen prompt, you will incur a penalty.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: When a certain number of penalties have been incurred, the performance will not end immediately, but your attempt will be unsuccessful.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In the event of failure or quitting during the performance, you may attempt it again by speaking to either of the Starlight celebrants.

dialogue.name: COMMITTEE03724A
dialogue.text: Oh, that wasn't bad at all, now was it? I try not to get my hopes too high, but I'm pleased to say you surpassed my decidedly modest expectations...again.

dialogue.name: COMMITTEE03724A
dialogue.text: If you haven't noticed, the audience is calling out for yet another encore. If you wouldn't mind obliging, perhaps you should speak with Amh.

dialogue.name: COMMITTEE03724B
dialogue.text: Lo and behold! The conductor of legend makes herhis most triumphant return! Worry not, maestro─I have assured your adoring audience that this year will mark the arrival of your magnum opus! Are you ready to share the gift of your musical genius with one and all?

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text:
Do you wish to begin the capriccio?
You will earn three certificates of good cheer for successful completion of this piece.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Yes.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Not yet.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: How do I conduct a choir?

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: What song will you perform?

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: Starlight, Starbright

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: Starlight de Chocobo

dialogue.name: COMMITTEE03724B
dialogue.text: Say no more, maestro! You require another moment or two to summon your muse before gracing the audience with the profound depths of your genius? Then it shall be so! Worry not─they and I both would wait until nigh the end of time for the legendary performance you will inevitably bring to them!

dialogue.name: COMMITTEE03724B
dialogue.text: Bravo! Oh, bravo! Why, it was as if the Twelve themselves descended from the heavens to grace our mortal ears with a harmony of sheer beatific bliss. No doubt our children, and their children, and their children to come will sing of the legendary performance they bore witness to this day.

dialogue.name: COMMITTEE03724B
dialogue.text: And Maestro, you have heard the voices, yes? Your adoring fans are calling out─nay, desperately pleading for yet another encore! You will oblige, yes? Oh, say that you will!

dialogue.name: LARTONPHE
dialogue.text: Song is truly one of the greatest gifts the gods bestowed on us. Nothing else quite has the power to bring together people of all ages, all heritages, and all walks of life. Thanks to you, I was finally able to share my love for music with my son, and I will be forever grateful for it.

dialogue.name: NALIPPONCQUE
dialogue.text: I know! Next year, why don't we sing together? That would be so much fun!

dialogue.name: CHOCOBO
dialogue.text: Kweh! Kweeeeeeh!♪

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The chocobo appears to be enjoying the Starlight festivities.

dialogue.name: AMHGARANJY
dialogue.text: Why, I daresay the performance was even better the second time around! Shows what a bit of seasoning can do for you, yes? Thank you for gracing us with your remarkable conducting talents once more!

dialogue.name: AMHGARANJY
dialogue.text: Believe it or not, the audience is calling out for yet another encore. I realize that you have other commitments─saving the realm and all that─but if you would be willing to oblige them before the season is over, you need only say the word!
